x.description: A numeric or unit object specifying the starting column x-position

width.description: A numeric or unit object specifying the width of columns

space.description: A numeric or unit object specifying the space between columns

n.description: An integer specifying the number of elements to generate columnpositions for

default.units.description: A string indicating the default units to useif \code{x}, \code{w}, or \code{s} are only given as numerics
